databases.name: Literature Resource Center
databases.description: Background information, scholarly journals, book chapters and magazines covering literary authors and works.

databases.name: Apa PsycARTICLES
databases.description: Scholarly journals in psychology and behavioral sciences published by the American Psychological Association and affiliates.

databases.name: America: History and Life with Full Text
databases.description: Scholarly journals, professional journals, and ebooks on the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present.

databases.name: Oxford Art Online
databases.description: Background information, artist biographies, and images of Western and non-Western art.

databases.name: Artstor
databases.description: High-resolution images of architecture, painting, sculpture, photography, decorative arts, and other forms of visual and material culture. Register within Artstor to organize images and create presentations.

databases.name: Business Source Complete
databases.description: Scholarly journals, company profiles, SWOT analyses, financial data, ebooks, conference proceedings, case studies, investment research, market research, and industry reports.

databases.name: Ovid Nursing and Health Professions Collection
databases.description: Scholarly journals in nursing and allied health fields.

databases.name: Cinahl Plus with Full Text
databases.description: Scholarly journals, professional journals and reports in nursing and allied health fields.

databases.name: Education Research Complete
databases.description: Scholarly and professional journals on teaching and learning in early childhood, K-12 and higher education, educational leadership and education policy.

databases.name: Ethnologue
databases.description: A guide to the living languages of the world, including language profiles, statistics, and maps.

databases.name: Eric
databases.description: Professional journals, scholarly journals and reports in the field of education.

databases.name: PubMed
databases.description: Scholarly journals in medicine and health sciences.

databases.name: Rehabilitation Reference Center
databases.description: Clinical reviews, research instruments, drug information, exercise images, and patient education resources.

databases.name: Health Reference Series
databases.description: Background information on illnesses, disorders, and other health-related issues.

databases.name: US Major Dailies
databases.description: Articles from The New York Times, Washington Post, Wall Street Journal, Los Angeles Times, and Chicago Tribune.

databases.name: Coronavirus Research Database
databases.description: Articles related to the COVID-19 pandemic.

databases.name: Access World News
databases.description: Articles from US and international newspapers.

databases.name: New York Times with Index
databases.description: Scanned versions of New York Times articles, stretching from 1851 through four years ago.

databases.name: Sacramento Bee Collection
databases.description: Newspaper articles, blog posts, and web-only content from the Sacramento Bee, 1984 to the present.

databases.name: Chronicle of Higher Education
databases.description: News and reports on trends and developments at colleges and universities.

databases.name: Flipster
databases.description: Popular magazines presented in a browseable interface.

databases.name: CountryWatch
databases.description: Background information, reports and current news about culture, politics, economics and the environment from countries around the world.

databases.name: Health Source: Consumer Edition
databases.description: Background information, magazines and reports on consumer health in medical sciences, food sciences/nutrition, childcare, sports medicine and general health.

databases.name: Health Source: Nursing/Academic Edition
databases.description: Scholarly journals on medical topics, and the Lexi-PAL Drug Guide with generic drug patient education sheets.

databases.name: Psychology & Behavioral Sciences Collection
databases.description: Scholarly journals in psychology, psychiatry, and behavioral sciences.

databases.name: Black Thought and Culture
databases.description: Letters, leaflets, speeches, and other primary source materials by notable Black figures, primarily from the United States.

databases.name: Debates over Slavery and Abolition
databases.description: Manuscripts, monographs, newspapers, letters, and other primary source materials relating to slavery and abolition in the colonies and United States.

databases.name: Institution of Slavery
databases.description: Newspapers, first-person accounts, government records, correspondence, and other primary source materials related to how slavery was conducted and experienced in the colonies and United States.

databases.name: Indigenous Peoples of North America
databases.description: Manuscript, monographs, photographs, society documents, newspapers, and other primary source materials by and about native peoples and tribes of North America.

databases.name: Lgbtq History and Culture Since 1940, Part I
databases.description: Primary source materials related to LGBTQ individuals, organizations, and movements in the United States and Great Britain, including: newsletters, newspapers, and periodicals by, for, and about gays and lesbians; materials from gay and lesbian organizations; documents related to the AIDS/HIV crisis of the 1980s and 90s.

databases.name: HeinOnline
databases.description: Case law, scholarly journals, and government documents including U.S. congressional documents, presidential documents, treaties, international constitutions, and classic treatises.

databases.name: Medline
databases.description: Scholarly journals, newspapers, magazines, and newsletters in medicine, nursing, dentistry, veterinary medicine, healthcare administration and pre-clinical sciences. Produced by the US National Library of Medicine.

databases.name: Veterinary Source
databases.description: Scholarly journals and magazines focusing on animal health care.

databases.name: Military & Government Collection
databases.description: Scholarly journals, magazines, and newspapers in military science and government.

databases.name: Sage Journals
databases.description: Scholarly journals in the health sciences, social sciences, humanities, engineering, and life sciences.

databases.name: Wiley Online Library
databases.description: Scholarly journals in the social sciences, life sciences, computer science, business, communication, and other fields.

databases.name: ScienceDirect
databases.description: Scholarly journals in health, medicine, psychology and life sciences.

databases.name: Oxford English Dictionary
databases.description: Definitions, pronunciations and historical background of words in the English language.

databases.name: Bloom's Literature Ebooks
databases.description: Collections of essays on literary works and authors, focusing on the modern literary traditions of Europe and the United States.

databases.name: Salem Press
databases.description: Ebooks and background information in career development, history, health, science, and literature.

databases.name: GreenFILE
databases.description: Scholarly journals covering human impact on the environment, climate change, green architecture, pollution, sustainable agriculture, renewable energy, and recycling.

databases.name: Naxos Music Library
databases.description: Classical and modern music.

databases.name: Newspaper Source Plus
databases.description: Regional, national and international newspapers, television and radio news transcripts.

databases.name: MasterFILE Complete
databases.description: Background information, magazines, biographies, primary source documents, maps, flags and images on different topics.

databases.name: Library, Information Science & Technology Abstracts
databases.description: Scholarly journals and magazines in library and information science.

databases.name: Teacher Reference Center
databases.description: Scholarly journals and professional journals on teaching and education leadership.

databases.name: Regional Business News
databases.description: U.S. business journals and news.

databases.name: MAS Ultra: School Edition
databases.description: Background information, biographies, primary source documents, maps, flags and images on many topics.

databases.name: Ahfs Consumer Medication Information
databases.description: Information on medications from the American Society of Health-System Pharmacists.

databases.name: New Play Exchange
databases.description: Scripts of plays by living playwrights, with the ability to filter by race/ethnicity, gender, and age.

databases.name: Ebony Magazine Archive
databases.description: Full content from 1945 to 2014 from the prominent mass-market magazine targeted to an African-American readership.

databases.name: Art Magazine Collection Archive
databases.description: Reproductions of the print magazines Antiques, ARTnews, and Art in America, with content spanning from 1902 to 2016.

databases.name: Atlantic Magazine Archive
databases.description: Full content from 1857 to 2014 from the renowned American magazine.

databases.name: Life Magazine Archive
databases.description: Complete coverage of the photojournalism magazine from its beginning in 1936 through 2000.

databases.name: Time Magazine Archive
databases.description: Page images of all issues of the prominent US news weekly magazine, from its beginning in 1923 through 2000.

databases.name: Vogue Archive
databases.description: Cover-to-cover page images of the prominent fashion magazine from 1892 to the current issue.

databases.name: Very Short Introductions
databases.description: Ebooks providing an overview of complex topics.

databases.name: Ebook Collection
databases.description: Ebooks on social sciences, information technology, the humanities, business, economics, and more.

databases.name: Ebook Central
databases.description: Scholarly and popular ebooks from various subject areas.

databases.name: Kanopy
databases.description: Feature films, documentaries, and educational videos.

databases.name: Drama Online
databases.description: Streaming video and audio of dramatic performances, including the National Theatre and Royal Shakespeare Company, film adaptations, published plays, and scholarly books on theatre. Key videos from Drama Online may also be found in the National Theatre Collection database, which is not expiring.

databases.name: National Theatre Collection
databases.description: Streaming video of live performances, including productions of Shakespeare, Greek classics, literary adaptations, and modern plays.

databases.name: Digital Theatre Plus
databases.description: Videos of theatre productions and interviews exploring the dramatic process. Includes essays and study guides concerning the history, theory and criticism of theatre.

databases.name: Swank Digital Campus
databases.description: Streaming video from major motion picture studios.

databases.name: Docuseek Complete Collection
databases.description: Films of various genres from independent and international filmmakers on a variety of topics.

databases.name: Global Environmental Justice Collection
databases.description: Documentary films that explore human rights and environmental protection issues triggered by inequality, global development and climate change.

databases.name: Opposing Viewpoints
databases.description: Viewpoint articles on current social issues and controversial topics.

databases.name: Newswires
databases.description: News reports from Associated Press, United Press International, PR Newswire, Xinhua, CNN Wire, and Business Wire from the last 30 days.

databases.name: Web News
databases.description: Includes over 14,000 feeds covering a range of business and general news topics. Click the title to go directly to the online source.

databases.name: Academic Search Complete
databases.description: Scholarly journals, professional journals, reports and magazines in the social sciences, the humanities, and general sciences.

databases.name: Cq Researcher
databases.description: In-depth reports on current social and political issues.

databases.name: Films on Demand
databases.description: Documentaries in the humanities, history, health, technical education, archival films, and much more.

databases.name: Gale eBooks
databases.description: Background information from general and subject encyclopedias.

databases.name: Jstor
databases.description: Scholarly journals in the humanities, social sciences, education and other fields.

databases.name: Google Scholar
databases.description: Scholarly journals, ebooks, abstracts, patents and legal research from academic, nonprofit and government sources. Use the Los Rios Full Text link for library-provided content.

databases.name: Explora
databases.description: Background information, magazines, news, ebooks, primary sources, and scholarly journals on many topics. Teaching and curriculum support for educators.

databases.name: CollegeSource Online
databases.description: College profiles, catalogs, transcript keys, and other resources related to higher education.

databases.name: OneSearch
databases.description: Los Rios Libraries' online catalog and access to the content of most databases held at Los Rios.

databases.name: Ebsco Search
databases.description: Scholarly journals, magazines, and ebooks from a variety of EBSCOhost databases.
